channel.title: ♕ PerfectionX Pk ♕- ♕We are back!♕ ♕Full screen on its way!♕♕BETA IS OUT PM ME♕
channel.description:
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2i8x1cy.png[/img] Hello everyone, my name is Prototype. I would like to bring forward to the community a new RSPS, PerfectionX. As you can tell by the title we are aiming for this server to be perfect. Originally PerfectionX, was not going to be released. This was as it was a project for me to learn from, but it is turning and 'perfectly'. I have managed to obtain a hoster, so at the movement the beta's going to be released next week. Hopefully, the full server would be released a few days before Christmas. We are going to make it Christmas related for December but then we are going to start on the hard stuff. Quote By hard stuff I mean: Summoning construction Dungeenering hunter full screen all bosses
Pic:
Here are some things about the server: Quote What base have used for PerfectionX? We have used gserver, it is be 'unique'. What is PerfectionX? It's the perfect RSPS. What would we like to have in the server in the short term? GWD,other dungeons, all bosses, claws,vls,stat, other weps,custom Armour, clan wars,jad,pits and other mini-games,perfection points. How many people do we want playing? 1500 <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG How are we going to achieve this? Top-lists,web-client,advertisement and some thing secret shhhhh.... What do we want to achieve from the server? Personally I would like to achieve many types of accomplishments. I would like to have the following: Perfect economy; fully working summoning; fully working construction; fully working dungeenering(first ever); all quests from the real RS. all the minigames all the new bosses
Now my friends i want to notify you about one thing we as a community can, we can make this work. My friends, you will soon see us at the top of all. At the moment what we have in-terms of skills(Red= not started,Orange= on the way, Green= finished) : Attack Magic Thieving Smithing Dungeenering Strength Rune-crafting Crafting Fishing Construction Defense Hit-points Fletching Fire-making summoning Range Agility Slayer Woodcutting Prayer Mining Farming Herblore
Ok what we are looking for is: server Coders Web designer Webclient maker client coders beta testers Terms: If your would like to apply please make sure that you are dedicated, we do not want people that will leave after a day. Also make sure that you are kind of mature and you do not fight with other people, we do not want fights between staff members. All developers will have a custom green crown just like the administrates one but in green.
Code: [Select] Name: Timezone: Job wanted: Any past experience? Why you chose PerfectionX? By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: I will post your application status HERE please check here: Positions At the moment: Owner: me co owner:---- Website designer:---- gfx designer:krack kid head coder:(still not decided) coder:---- coder:---- coder:---- junior coder:--- junior coder:--- Advertisement: a lot of people = ) if you do like our server please use this in your signatures everywhere.
Thankyou Krack Kid

item.title: ♕ PerfectionX Pk ♕- ♕We are back!♕ ♕Full screen on its way!♕♕BETA IS OUT PM ME♕
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:19, topic:380570”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=476397.msg3493059#msg3493059 date=1297059768]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=476397.msg3493048#msg3493048 date=1297059262]

You will fail at the dungeoneering part. I don’t care how great of a coder you are, or what determination you have, but with the currently available tools that would literally take years.
[/quote]Fail? Would take me a week at most.

To perfect it, incorrect. Have you actually played dungeoneering in RS?
[/quote]To perfect it, no man alone could, only Jagex can, nobody is able to just ‘perfect’ something that’s already been done in the RS2 protocol.
But to make the basics, pretty easy.[/quote]

Obviously. But you must be one to realize that creating the basics is not actually creating the skill.

Read full topic

item.title: ♕ PerfectionX Pk ♕- ♕We are back!♕ ♕Full screen on its way!♕♕BETA IS OUT PM ME♕
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

2i8x1cy.png1365×719

Hello everyone, my name is Prototype. I would like to bring forward to the community a new RSPS, PerfectionX. As you can tell by the title we are aiming for this server to be perfect. Originally PerfectionX, was not going to be released. This was as it was a project for me to learn from, but it is turning and ‘perfectly’. I have managed to obtain a hoster, so at the movement the beta’s going to be released next week. Hopefully, the full server would be released a few days before Christmas. We are going to make it Christmas related for December but then we are going to start on the hard stuff.
Quote
By hard stuff I mean:
Summoning
construction
Dungeenering
hunter
full screen
all bosses

Pic:

Here are some things about the server:
Quote
What base have used for PerfectionX?
We have used gserver, it is be ‘unique’.
What is PerfectionX?
It’s the perfect RSPS.
What would we like to have in the server in the short term?
GWD,other dungeons, all bosses, claws,vls,stat, other weps,custom Armour, clan wars,jad,pits and other mini-games,perfection points.
How many people do we want playing?
1500 <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG
How are we going to achieve this?
Top-lists,web-client,advertisement and some thing secret shhhhh…
What do we want to achieve from the server?
Personally I would like to achieve many types of accomplishments. I would like to have the following:
Perfect economy;
fully working summoning;
fully working construction;
fully working dungeenering(first ever);
all quests from the real RS.
all the minigames
all the new bosses

Now my friends i want to notify you about one thing we as a community can, we can make this work. My friends, you will soon see us at the top of all.
At the moment what we have in-terms of skills(Red= not started,Orange= on the way, Green= finished) :
Attack Magic Thieving Smithing Dungeenering
Strength Rune-crafting Crafting Fishing Construction
Defense Hit-points Fletching Fire-making summoning
Range Agility Slayer Woodcutting
Prayer Mining Farming Herblore

Ok what we are looking for is:
server Coders
Web designer
Webclient maker
client coders
beta testers
Terms:
If your would like to apply please make sure that you are dedicated, we do not want people that will leave after a day. Also make sure that you are kind of mature and you do not fight with other people, we do not want fights between staff members. All developers will have a custom green crown just like the administrates one but in green.

Code: [Select]
Name:
Timezone:
Job wanted:
Any past experience?
Why you chose PerfectionX?
By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned:
I will post your application status HERE please check here:
Positions At the moment:
Owner: me
co owner:----
Website designer:----
gfx designer:krack kid
head coder:(still not decided)
coder:----
coder:----
coder:----
junior coder:—
junior coder:—
Advertisement: a lot of people = )
if you do like our server please use this in your signatures everywhere.

Thankyou Krack Kid

Read full topic
